OCD.name: Publisher
OCD.description: A wire component which publishes data to the cloud platform

AD.name: cloud.service.pid
AD.description: Specify the pid of the Cloud Service that has to used to publish messages to the cloud platform.

AD.name: publish.application
AD.description: Application topic prefix to be used when publishing messages.

AD.name: publish.topic
AD.description: Application portion of the topic to be used when publishing messages.

AD.name: publish.control.messages
AD.description: Allows to specify if the messages will be published as control messages (true) or data messages (false).

AD.name: publish.priority
AD.description: Relative ordering of this message with other messages that may be currently queued for publishing. Application should consider using priority 5 or higher.

AD.name: publish.qos
AD.description: An integer specifying the quality of service the message was published on.

AD.name: publish.retain
AD.description: Whether or not the broker should retain the message

AD.name: publish.payload.type
AD.description: Option to control whether the wire records will be wrapped into a Kura Payload or a JSON message

AD.name: severity.level
AD.description: It signifies severity level of Wire Fields to be accepted by this Wire Component
